title: Consistantly High Ping
body:
Ever since 7.3 i have had ping that will stick between 300-600. ive done trace routes, gotten a new router, ran the hextech tool even had the techs come out and check my cables to make sure it is 100%. weird thing is its worse when the featured mode is going on. any help would be appreciated.


Update: when the featured mode is not going on i am around 150-300. also if i run a cmd window in the background with ping 192.64.170.1 -t i am down to 100. its playable but it spikes alot. when  i hit CTRL+C to end i avgerage around 56% packet loss

replies.body:
Is the higher ping consistent or random?  It does seem like some kind of unstable connection getting to the game server.  Running a traceroute is fine, but I suggest using [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)instead of cmd.   You'll want to route to 104.160.131.1 if you're playing on NA.  

If you end up running into more high ping and packet loss, then run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This will help rule out possibilities with local and setting problems specific to your case.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know how it goes.

I'll take your word for it regarding the packet loss, because it looks like you've got some pretty major issues before ever leaving your own network.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your connection, so that your routing will be strong once you start routing to the game server.  I hope that helps!

odd thing is after 7.5 the lag is gone. idk if one of the hops was doing maintenance so i was directed to another lesser one along the way during that time but the issue is solved now if i could only get my other issue solved
